meanings.definition: A device that emits a bright light in short, rapid bursts.
meanings.sent1: The strobes on the dance floor lit up the room with quick flashes.
meanings.sent2: The photographer used strobes to capture the perfect shot in the dark studio.
meanings.sent3: The strobes at the party made everyone look like they were dancing in a disco ball.
meanings.sent4: The strobes in the night sky resembled a celestial fireworks display.
meanings.sent5: The strobes created a dazzling effect, making everything seem to freeze in time.

meanings.definition: To emit flashes of light in short, rapid bursts.
meanings.sent1: The police car strobes alerted drivers to move aside quickly.
meanings.sent2: The lightning strobes across the sky during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The fireflies strobes in the garden, creating a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: Her smile strobes in the dimly lit room, brightening up the space.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse strobes guided ships safely through the rough waters.
